name: [VIDEO NFT] PREMIERE HORBOWY.ART DRONE DROP: Honeymoon Island Florida. (Mint Price 1 Tez swapping for 1/10,000 Editions)
description:
HOOK
COLLECT THIS DRONE VIDEO NFT
Brother Benjamin introduces Mission Driven NFTs to the world with the creative medium of Drone Videography. 

STORY
LEARNING BY DOING
This video serves as a live demo and real world learning. 
Once you swap only 1 Tez for 1 edition of the 10,000 editions available, you are now a Horbowy.Art Collector. 
(Sept 4, 2021 Price of $XTZ = $5.50)

OFFER
GAIN ACCESS TO HORBOWY.ART DIGITAL STUDIO 
Collectors of this NFT gain access to our Executive Leadership Academy where you can learn How to Empower your Ministry with Angel Seed Funds using Mission Driven NFTs.

LIMITED EDITIONS
1000 EDITIONS COSTING ONLY 1 TEZ (Singular for Tezos)
This Premiere Video NFT is the only NFT that will ever cost only 1 Tez per NFT of the Horbowy.Art Collection. 
This is the lowest point of entry into our ecosystem and we are doing this to evangelize and educate ambassadors of Web3.0. 

For only 1 Tez, welcome to the family. 
Collectors are encouraged to resell their NFT. 
We will give you and your resell-collector a special perk over a live call with Br. Benjamin.

COMING NEXT
- 1000 Editions of a 100 Tezos NFT
- 7 Monthly Drops of LIMITED FEWER editions per drop. 
- Weekly Drone Drops 3 Editions for 3 Tezos.
Delivered Drops 1st Friday Monthly/Weekly at 3pm Florida Time.

GUIDE TO COLLECTING HORBOWY ART NFTs. 
STEP 1. Swap Tezos for Art. 
STEP 2. Claim Access at Horbowy.Art by listing your Public Key with our system.
STEP 3. Share with friends and family the impactful stories that come with every Horbowy NFT. 

HORBOWY.ART CURATORS
Late Artistic Director Zbigniew Horbowy 
Spiritual Leader & Poland’s First Deacon: Thaddeus John Horbowy.
Visionary Artist Sir Knight Benjamin Alexander Thaddeus John Horbowy.
Blockchain Advisor: Jason Rashidnia
